Name: Shura
Text: Hello! I'm kinda lost, I don't know what's going on.

Name: Shura
Text: I was riding my motorcycle and I suddenly went through a portal that appeared out of nowhere.

Name: Shura
Text: I went into a store real quick to ask for information about this place, I was there for just one minute!

Name: Shura
Text: And when I came back outside I saw a bald guy stealing my motorcycle!!!
